## Loading packages

```{r}
library(readr)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```

## Reading in the data

```{r}
data <- read_csv(here("content", "data", "answer_export.csv"))
```

## Examining the data

```{r}
glimpse(data)

table(data$question_id)
table(data$content)
```

### Rename the columns

```{r}
data <- data %>% 
        rename(ID = id,
       answer = content,
       SID = session_id,
       QID = question_id) %>%
        select(answer, SID, QID)
```

### Mutating Columns

```{r}
newdata <- data %>% mutate(ID = 1:nrow(data))

as.character(data$QID)

newdata <- newdata %>% mutate(QID = as.character(QID))
```

### Stringr operations

```{r}
newdata$answer

str_trim(newdata$answer)

str_extract(newdata$answer, pattern = )
```
